short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removing doubts in the crypto space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removing doubts in the crypto space.

Sensic is a crypto fraud detector which uses machine learning models and AI to predict whether ETH addresses and URL links are fraudulent.

Sensic uses a database containing 80,000+ ETH addresses and 500,000+ URL links to train our machine learning model in identifying fraud. 

Moreover, we publish the Fear & Greed Index on a daily basis to show users the current state of the crypto market. 

Lastly, click on our website link to learn more about Sensic and our mission.
